title: The Silver Cup Test
summary: Genesis 44 tells how Joseph secretly places his silver cup in Benjamin’s sack. After the brothers depart, Joseph’s steward stops them and accuses them of theft. Judah offers himself in place of Benjamin, revealing a change of heart.

faq.question: Why did Joseph put the cup in Benjamin’s sack?
faq.answer: To test his brothers’ loyalty and willingness to protect Benjamin.

faq.question: What did Judah offer to do?
faq.answer: He offered to become Joseph’s slave instead of Benjamin, showing his selflessness.
